properties.body:
WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
BALEARIC ISLANDS TO SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
1. S/V BREEZER, WHITE HULL, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD,
   OVERDUE PALMA DE MALLORCA (39-34N 002-39E) TO
   SARDINIA (40-00N 009-00E). LAST KNOWN POSITION
   38-32N 007-59E AT 160750Z JUL. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1779/16.
